漫天.definition: lit. to fill the whole sky; everywhere; as far as the eye can see

漫天遍地.definition: lit. to fill the whole sky and cover the land (idiom); fig. everywhere; as far as the eye can see

漫天遍野.definition: lit. to fill the whole sky and cover the land; everywhere; as far as the eye can see

漫天飛舞.definition: (of snow etc) to fill the sky

漫山遍野.definition: lit. covering the mountains and the plains (idiom); fig. as far as the eye can see; covering everything; omnipresent

漫步.definition: to wander; to ramble; recreational hiking; to perambulate

漫溢.definition: to overflow; to be brimming over

漫漶.definition: (of writing etc) indistinct (due to water damage or wear)

漫無邊際.definition: extremely vast; boundless; limitless; digressing; discursive; going off on tangents; straying far off topic

漫說.definition: not to mention ... (i.e. in addition to sth)

漫遊.definition: to travel around; to roam; (mobile telephony) roaming
